txt.en: 'You know friend, between your fighting skills and my connexions, we could make each other some extra coin.'
'Yes, these will do nicely. Very good!'
Eshéra has suggested you defeat bats to collect their wings in Ilmabiri, beneath the Sail-haven of Umbar Baharbêl.
You have collected the wings of defeated bats in the sewers beneath the Sail-haven of Umbar Baharbêl. You should bring them to Eshéra at Hêbatokh, her camp in Ilmabiri.
'Yes, these will do nicely. Very good, [placeholder]. Here is your cut.'
'Yes, these will do nicely. Very good, [placeholder]. Here is your cut.'
Eshéra has a plan to make some extra coin for you both by selling bat wings to a dealer at the market in Umbar-môkh.

'You know friend, between your fighting skills and my connexions, we could make each other some extra coin.'

The woman gives you a sly smile.

'I happen to know someone in the markets of Umbar-môkh that will pay well for bat wings. Why? I have no idea, and neither do I care, as long as they pay the agreed-upon price.'
